user_register: By clicking the Next button you will create your user account

formValidation.exist: The given e-mail address is already taken.
formValidation.error: There was an error sending the e-mail confirming the registration. Please try again later
formValidation.success: We have sent you an email to confirm your registration

resetPassword.title: Password update
resetPassword.subtitle: Create your new password below
resetPassword.submit: Create a new password and go to login
resetPassword.invalid: The given passwords do not match

agreement.policyAgreement: The administrator of your personal data is FANUC Polska sp.z o.o. based in Wroc≈Çaw. By completing the form, you consent to the processing of personal data for analytical and statistical purposes. If you give your consent, your data will also be processed for the purpose of marketing communication by e-mail and SMS / MMS. More information on the processing of personal data and your rights can be found in our Privacy Policy
agreement.rodo: I consent to the processing of my personal data for marketing purposes by FANUC Polska sp.z o.o.
agreement.offerties: I agree to receive commercial and marketing information from FANUC Polska sp.z o.o. to the e-mail address provided by me.
agreement.phones: I agree to receive commercial and marketing information from FANUC Polska sp.z o.o. by telephone to the telephone number provided by me.

step1.currencyText: Before we start - choose your currency
step1.description: If you do not know the exact value for a given field, try your best to estimate it

pdf.title: ROI report
pdf.tco: (Total Cost of Ownership) - considers the total cost of acquiring, installing, using and maintaining the robotic system over a period of time.
pdf.works: Savings resulting from the reduction of labor costs (man-hours)
pdf.workersAbsence: Savings resulting from the reduction of employees absences costs
pdf.raiseAmount: Profit resulting from the increase in production volume
pdf.raiseAmountDescription: takes the value "0", if the profit on a single piece of a part is not specified
pdf.raiseQuality: Savings resulting from an increase in production quality, i.e. a reduction in the number of defective parts
pdf.raiseQualityDescription: i.e. reducing the number of defective parts (takes the value "0", if no profit on a single piece of part has been given)

clauses.protectionClause: FANUC Polska sp.z o.o. undertakes to maintain the confidentiality of the Confidential Information provided and to use it only for the purpose of possible preparation and submission of an offer to the Customer and to take the necessary steps to ensure the confidentiality of the information received.
clauses.informationClause: FANUC Polska sp.z o.o. declares that the results presented by the Calculator based on the data entered by the Customer are only illustrative and do not give rise to any liability on the part of FANUC Polska sp.z o.o.

downloadPopupHeader: While downloading the calculation will be saved to your account. Would you like to set it a name?
previousCalcPrompt: Would you like to load a previous calculation?
